description: My place is close to Madison Square park, very centric only 3 blocks from the subway (6 Line on 28th and Park) and only 3 blocks to Madison Square park and the historic Flatiron building. This is a cozy studio which can sleep up to 4. The living room couch is built into a murphy bed, very easy to bring up and down and very comfortable mattress. This is a duplex studio so there is another divided space with a futon, next to the dining room table which sleeps 2 more and is also very comfortable.
name: Cozy Duplex Studio in Manhattan
review:
Lovely apartment in the heart of Manhattan, definitely a great place to stay for a weekend in the Big Apple!
The apartment is fully furnished and although it can fit 4 people, I'd say 3 persons max gives more room for everyone.
Overall, we had a great stay here, thanks a lot for hosting us!
